name: Laszlo's Tower
description:
After many failed attempts at creating inventions that would pass the challenge, Laszlo was about to give up... until he got an idea. "Combine all of them together!" he thought, and combine them he did!

GitHub Repository:

https://github.com/OsamaElHariri/LaszlosTower

(Audio credits are in the GitHub Repository)

I used Godot to make this game,

I made the art in Inkscape,

and edited the audio in Audacity
